meanings.sent1: The rubber band showed its pliableness when stretched around the book.
meanings.sent2: The clay's pliableness made it perfect for shaping into different figures.
meanings.sent3: The pliableness of the yoga mat made it seem like a living, breathing material.
meanings.sent4: Her mind's pliableness allowed her to adapt to new situations effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The pliableness of the tree branches in the wind was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.sent1: His pliableness in arguments often led him to agree with others quickly.
meanings.sent2: The cult leader took advantage of her pliableness to manipulate her beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's pliableness to treats made training sessions a breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her pliableness in changing her opinions made her a versatile team player.
meanings.sent5: The pliableness of her mind allowed her to see things from different perspectives.

meanings.definition: Able to be easily shaped or molded
meanings.sent1: The dough's pliableness made it simple to form into various bread shapes.
meanings.sent2: The artist admired the clay's pliableness as he sculpted a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent3: The pliableness of the playdough made it a favorite toy for the children.
meanings.sent4: Her pliableness in adapting to new environments made her a sought-after employee.
meanings.sent5: The pliableness of the material allowed for intricate designs to be created effortlessly.
